Text: The quality is excellent and I am glad that I found a higher quality version of this series. Thank you uploader.

-1
I take back the WebM stuff, it is x264 (Showtime player must have mistaken). And 4:3 is normal for a 2004 season.  Sorry.
Season 1 and 2 are widescreen, somehow this is not. The 2004 excuse does not wash.

"Somehow these are not?" Do you think I would go ahead and crop the picture myself?  The dvd's for the seasons in my torrents lacking widescreen, are not widescreen. Join Netflix, order these dvds and see for yourself.  If you've seen them in widescreen elsewhere, then they weren't from the American dvds.  I can't do any more than my source for dvds provide.

And to people who are complaining about the grain...once again, order the dvds.  I didn't add the grain myself.  In fact, the dvds are even grainier. I ran these through a weak denoise filter.  If you take out too much of the grain, you lose detail.  If you'd rather get the 350mb mp3 xvid crap, no one is stopping you.

thanks for these torrents, meech
